item.title: Zelensky declares energy emergency as biting cold persists
item.description: The move comes as US President Donald Trump said Ukraine is "less ready" than the Russian president to make a peace deal.

item.title: Watch: Astronauts return to Earth after medical evacuation
item.description: Four astronauts who left the International Space Station (ISS) a month early due to one of the crew members falling ill have returned to Earth on Thur...

item.title: Widespread delays hit Uganda election amid internet shutdown
item.description: The election is a rematch between Bobi Wine and Yoweri Museveni, who has been president for 40 years.

item.title: Federal agent shoots Minneapolis man in leg after attack, officials say
item.description: The agent was acting in self-defence after being attacked with a shovel, said the Department of Homeland Security.

item.title: She's offered to share her Nobel with Trump. But what might Machado ask for in return?
item.description: Venezuela's opposition leader will meet with US President Donald Trump at the White House on Thursday.
